body_html: I'm closing this. It looks like this was a problem with the OpenMPI that I custom built. I am now using OpenMPI version 2.1.4 with the --enable-mpi-thread-multiple flag. And the problem seemed to have disappeared. We'll try to re-test with versions 3.x to make sure they work.
body_text: I'm closing this.  It looks like this was a problem with the OpenMPI that I custom built.  I am now using OpenMPI  version 2.1.4  with the --enable-mpi-thread-multiple  flag.  And the problem seemed to have disappeared.   We'll try to re-test with versions 3.x to make sure they work.
body: I'm closing this.  It looks like this was a problem with the OpenMPI that I custom built.  I am now using OpenMPI  version 2.1.4  with the --enable-mpi-thread-multiple  flag.  And the problem seemed to have disappeared.   We'll try to re-test with versions 3.x to make sure they work.
